info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:43PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Deer Lodge and northwestern Silver Bow Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 242 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Anaconda, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. Heavy downpours will accompany winds and hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gregson Hot Springs, Crackerville, and Opportunity. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 204 and 212. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
